description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController that provides several basic endpoints including a welcome message, redirect to API documentation, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for the tictactoebackend application, including welcome, documentation redirect, health check, and info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message for the application.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI page, preserving the original request's scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check endpoint returning 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
